import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import "../../css/inventory.css" import ProductsDataService from '../../services/products' import ProductItems from './InventoryComponents/ProductItem' import { useHistory } from "react-router" import AddProductModal from "./InventoryComponents/AddProductModal"; import QueryBox from "./InventoryComponents/QueryBox"; const Inventory = (props) =>{ const history = useHistory(); const [query,setQuery] = useState(""); const [ownedProducts,setOwnedProducts] = useState([]); const [overlayStyle,setOverlayStyle] = useState({}); useEffect(()=>{ refreshProductsList(); },[]) const refreshProductsList = () =>{ ProductsDataService.getAllOwnedProducts().then((res)=>{ setOwnedProducts(res.data); }); } const typeQueryBox = (e) =>{ setQuery(e.target.value) } const addProductToggle = () =>{ setOverlayStyle({left:0}); } const closeModal = () =>{ setOverlayStyle({left:"100%"}) } return(
